title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 8 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 8 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Go Woke, Go Broke is the new motto of the NBA. Sports used to be a unifying force for people. The great Michael Jordan always said: Republicans buy sneakers, too. Clay talks disparagingly about his Bengal cats, upsetting several staff members. Rush's Timeless Wisdom on unmasking and the entitled Deep State who gleefully ruin American lives. Where is the pushback to the left's nonstop propaganda war. Remember "two weeks to flatten the curve"? It's now 18 masked months later the Biden administration is checking vaccines "door to door."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
